title: DSWO Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for 04 Gender Specialist and It Assistant Posts
description: The District Social Welfare Office (DSWO) has announced the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for 04 Gender Specialists and IT Assistant Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in Any Degree, post-graduation, can grab this chance and apply for these posts. Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for the DSWO Recruitment 2025 .
